title: Smart Home IoT - MQTT Protocol Example

header.title: Introduction to MQTT Documentation
header.content: This example demonstrates how to document MQTT-based IoT systems using APIDoc v5. It covers both publishing sensor data and subscribing to actuator commands.

footer.title: About MQTT
footer.content: MQTT is a lightweight messaging protocol ideal for IoT applications. It uses a publish/subscribe model with topics and supports three Quality of Service (QoS) levels for message delivery.
